headline.main: FOSTER PARENTS' PLAN HONORS INDUSTRIALIST; Russell Maguire Named Honorary President of Group

lead_paragraph: In recognition of his "adoption" of ten war-orphaned children under the Foster Parents' Plan and his interest in their welfare, the Foster Parents' Plan for Children, Inc., 55 West Forty-second Street, announced yesterday the appointment of Russell Maguire, Industrialist, of this city, as honorary chairman of the organization.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WAR CHILDREN, FOSTER PARENTS PLAN FOR, INC
